Funds are available and early to need due to schedule delays for the B-52 Tactical Data Link | (TDL) program. The Lot 2 Request for Proposal (RFP) was released in March 2023 with an anticipated award date of December 2024. The delivery of the firm proposal has been delayed and the anticipated contract award date is now March 2025. TDL has sufficient FY 2025 funds to award a production lot of 33
